data.meta_description: Apple Books is the best place to discover, read and listen to entertaining and informative books and audiobooks. Browse through top charts, personalised recommeâ¦
data.text:
Apple Books is the best place to discover, read and listen to entertaining and informative books and audiobooks. Browse through top charts, personalised recommendations and expertly curated collections in the Book Store and Audiobook Store, or use search to easily find the perfect read or listen, no subscription needed. Track what youâve read and want to read, and set your own reading goalsâall in one app and across all your Apple devices.

Explore millions of books and audiobooks â¨

â¢ Check out todayâs bestsellers, free books and special offers for readers of all ages, plus personalised recommendations.â¨

â¢ Explore collections curated by the Apple Books team to find your next book or audiobook in your favourite genres, from mysteries and thrillers to romance, history, self-development and kids.

â¨â¢ Sample any book or preview an audiobook to start enjoying the first few pages for free.â¨

â¢ Keep track of the books and audiobooks youâre interested in with your Want to Read list.

Customise your reading experienceâ¨

â¢ Choose from a selection of reading themes, which include a variety of fonts and background colours.â¨

â¢ Make your book easy to read by adjusting line height and letter spacing to your preference.â¨

â¢ Use Auto-Night Theme and adjust your screen brightness to make reading more comfortable for your eyes.â¨

â¢ Enable vertical scrolling to move continuously through books instead of flipping pages.

Make reading a habit with Reading Goalsâ¨

â¢ Set a reading goal to encourage yourself to read daily.â¨

â¢ Track reading streaks and how many books youâve read this year.â¨

â¢ Get reminders and coaching to help you achieve your reading goals.

Share with your whole familyâ¨â¢ Family Sharing lets you enjoy your books and audiobooks with your favourite people. Invite up to five family members.

Apple CarPlay â¨

â¢ Designed with safety in mind, the Audiobooks app in Apple CarPlay allows you to listen to audiobooks while driving.â¨

â¢ Large buttons make it easy to start and stop, rewind or fast forward, and the simplified library helps you find your next audiobook while still keeping your eyes on the road.

Apple Watch featuresâ¨

â¢ Use the Audiobooks app on Apple Watch to get back to your recent audiobooks or browse your library right from your wrist.â¨

â¢ Use the Watch app on iPhone to choose which audiobooks to download to your Apple Watch.

Requirements & store availabilityâ¨

â¢ iPhone requires iOS 11 or later.

â¢ iPad requires iPadOS 11 or later.

â¨â¢ Content varies by country or region and may not be available on all devices.

UPDATE: whoever fixed the annotation issue i love you and i hope you get a raise. OLD REVIEW: Came to the app store to find a new reader. Glad to see I'm not the only one who's having trouble with the new version- hopefully they'll revert it!! Here are some more suggestions: -the app deletes books off the device to save space. it's always done this but with the new version, it's not always able to re-download them- even if the epub is saved local on the files app! i've lost annotated copies. please fix this, and add a way to turn off the feature in the first place. i want all my books saved local. -every time you open the annotations list, it takes you back to the top. I'd like to be able to scroll through my annotations, click one and read it, and then open the list again and be where I left off so I don't have to scroll down and find it again. It's so annoying-i have hundreds of annotations in some books. the original version held your place in the list. Everything else I've seen described in other reviews. you dont even have to go through the trouble of fixing all this just take it back to the previous version pleaseeeeee please
